definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be ready (NH adj. [[עָתִיד]] future (as prepared); Ar. 9atuda be ready, prepared (also great, bulky); Syr. 9tod, Targum in der. spec. and deriv.);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Imv. ms. sf. [[וְעַתְּדָהּ]] Pr 24:27 and make it ready i. e. thy work (‖[[הָכֵן]]).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[הִתְעַתְּדוּ לִגַלִּים]] Job 15:28 which [houses] were prepared (destined) for (i.e. to be) heaps of ruin.
